mapper.select: SELECT T1.CST_SV_ASN_NO , T1.CNTR_NO , T1.CNTR_SN , T1.WK_WARE_NO AS WARE_NO /* 창고번호 */ , T1.ICHR_PRTNR_NO AS WARE_MNGT_PRTNR_NO /* 창고관리파트너번호 */ , T1.ITM_PD_CD /* 품목상품코드 */ , T1.USE_QTY AS QTY /* 수량 */ , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') AS PROCS_YM , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') AS PROCS_DT , '2' AS WARE_DV /* 창고구분 */ , '213' AS IOST_TP /* 입출고유형코드 */ , 'D' AS WORK_DIV /* 작업구분 (A : 등록, D : 삭제) */ , '10' AS MNGT_UNIT /* 관리단위 */ , 'A' AS ITEM_GD /* 상품등급 */ FROM TB_SVST_SV_WK_OSTR_IZ T1 WHERE CST_SV_ASN_NO = #{cstSvAsnNo} AND CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn} AND SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD ='1112' AND DTA_DL_YN = 'N'
mapper.update:
UPDATE TB_SVPD_CST_SVAS_IST_ASN_IZ SET WK_PRGS_STAT_CD = '00' , WK_EXCN_DT = NULL , WK_EXCN_HH = NULL
WHERE CST_SV_ASN_NO = #{cstSvAsnNo}

UPDATE TB_SVPD_CST_SV_BFSVC_ASN_IZ SET VST_PRGS_STAT_CD = '00' , WK_EXCN_DT = NULL
WHERE CST_SV_ASN_NO = #{cstSvAsnNo}
